0000001111011111 1101101101010101 0 -> sum: 1101111100110100, cout: 0
1101011010010000 1010010101000101 0 -> sum: 0111101111010101, cout: 1
1000001100010010 1110001100001110 1 -> sum: 0110011000100001, cout: 1
